ad_creative_link_descriptions:
üîó CONVERSATION HERE: https://jitsi.pirati.cz/ENtalk üîó

Do you want to improve your conversational skills in English? üó£Ô∏è

Do you like to meet and chat with people who otherwise do not have an opportunity to talk in English? üßë‚Äçü§ù‚Äçüßë

This is a place to do that and, at the same time, have some fun as well! 

The topics of conversation could be anything and everything like daily events, movies, books, cultural events, food, cooking (my personal favored), and many many more üëã

Your English skills do not have to be perfect; the point is to have some fun and at the same time to meet people that have a few things in common with you üôå

Join us next Tuesday! 

About Stanley

My name is Stanley Schram.  I was born in Czechoslovakia and left the country quite young.  I spent a two years in Muenchen, West Germany, and then relocated to the United States.  The first couple of years I lived at the East Cost, in Maryland and in Virginia, and then I relocated to San Diego, Southern California. I used to work for mainly international companies and traveled quite a lot to Russia, and then to India, among other countries.  I learned different cultures and that has been a very valuable experience.  After close to forty year living abroad, I decided - based on very personal reasons - to return to Czech republic to Brno, to which I have very strong ties.
